bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame, seatstay & chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, BB95, internal derailleur & dropper post routing, ISCG 05 mount, magnesium EVO link, G2 Geometry, 120mm travel

components.description: RockShox Revelation RCT3 w/Solo Air, Motion Control DNA damper, lockout, rebound, E2 tapered steerer, 15mm Maxle Lite, custom G2 geometry w/51mm offset, 120mm travel
Fox Factory Series Float w/DRCV, CTD (climb-trail-descend) damper, rebound, Kashima coating, tuned by Trek in California, 7.25x1.875"
Bontrager Rhythm Elite Tubeless Ready w/Stacked Lacing, Rapid Drive, 15mm front hub; 142x12 rear hub
Bontrager XR3 Team Issue Tubeless Ready, aramid bead, 29x2.30"
Bontrager Evoke RXL Carbon, carbon rails
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise
Bontrager Race XXX Lite Carbon, 31.8mm, 7 degree
Cane Creek IS-3, E2, alloy cartridge
